mapper.select: select noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeWriter, noticeRegDate from ( select rownum rn, noticeNo, noticeTitle, noticeWriter, noticeRegDate from t_noticeBoard where noticeLevel=1 and rownum <=5 ) order by noticeRegDate desc
mapper.update: update t_noticeBoard set noticeHit = noticeHit+1 where noticeNo=#{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: insert into t_noticeBoard(noticeNo, noticeWriter, noticeTitle, noticeContent, noticeLevel) values(seq_notice.NEXTVAL, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeLevel})
mapper.select: select * from (select * from t_noticeBoard) where rownum <=4
